## SuspensionStyle1

> Use
```javascript

<suspension-style-1 :dataList="dataList1" ref="suspension1" />
const dataList1 = {
    header:{
        icon:"icon-guangboqi iconfont",
        title:"智慧音柱-DF45",
        information:"海口市美兰区江东大道"
    },
    content:{
        id:"编号：0972A873AAF211EA8A5A00163E02E0CA",
        x:"经度：110.389148",
        y:"纬度：20.071856",
        statustext:"设备状态：",
        status:"在线",
        volume:"音量：0分贝",
        time:"最后上报时间：2021-04-26 21:00:12"
    }
}
```

> Props

参数|说明|类型|可选值|默认值
-|-|-|-|-
dataList|悬浮框数据|Object|-|-
